title: 297. The Stupidest Thing You Can Do With Your Money
description: It's hard enough to save for a house, tuition, or retirement. So why are we willing to pay big fees for subpar investment returns? Enter the low-cost index fund. The revolution will not be monetized.
author: editor@freakonomics.com (Freakonomics Radio + Stitcher)
